name: Multi-Cade
description:
A Arcade with Multiplayer. 2 Early Concept Builds are out as well.

0.1.0 is The Original Build that established SinglePlayer & Multiplayer Modes.

0.2.0 is The Build that started development on the Arcade Machine System.

0.3.0 includes 2 "Demos" of Other Games' By RainbowKappa789 but as Arcade Editions.

< 0.4.0 pulled due to being too unpolished >
